project.title: Formvilla
project.aim: this project because any decesion based on any event or product is so much dependent on users feedback.creating dynamic forms - in that user create form and add questions in that. we supported total 4 type of question.Sharing form so that other fill the forms. so user can put csv of email address to send access link of form so we send mail to that user. Analyze users form submission details using Pie Charts, Bar Charts & also finding paricular user's responseforms are custmizable so we can create quiz forms and take quiz of student. so forms have live period in that period only reponse is accepted.

details.title: Features
points: Creating dynamic forms - in that user create form and add questions.
We support total 4 type of question. (Single Choice,Multiple Choice,Textual and numerical)
Sharing form so that other fill the forms. so user can put csv of email address to send access link of form so we send mail to that user.
Analyze users form submission details using Pie Charts, Bar Charts & also finding paricular user's response.
Forms are custmizable so we can create quiz forms and take quiz of student. so forms have live period in that period only reponse is accepted.

nextProject.title: Webofart
nextProject.aim: This project aim is to provide platform to sell and buy art. User can also start and others can particate, The one with the highest big takes away the art at the end of auction

details.title: Features
points: User is able to start and conclude the auctions
User can filter art with various categories
